task.title: How to Create a New Task
task.shortdesc: We need to create task's in Oxygen for class, so we are learning how.

taskbody.prereq:
Between "Task Body" and "Context" hit Enter and select Prerequisites to add this section.
To get this, I hit enter and then selected Unordered List.
This is a sub list. I created a new unordered list under a list.

step.cmd: Create a New Step within the Task.
step.info: You should also add into tags after steps with more descriptions. The task itself should only have one action item.
Hit enter, then select step again. It will automatically propagate as step 2 in an ordered list.
